description.displayText: Marisa was hired by my husband and I in 2018 and worked with us until our daughter turned 3 in 2021. She was truly a blessing! As a first time mother, I knew absolutely nothing about how to care for a baby. Even worst, I had really bad postpartum. Marisa was patient, empathetic, knowledgeable and nurturing. She gave breastfeeding tips, assisted me with chores, but most importantly she was an amazing care giver to my baby. Our daughter grew to love her immensely. Marisa helped her excel at all milestones. She taught her letters, numbers, shapes, colors very early on. She combed her hair, groomed her nails and always kept her well dressed. Our daughter was the little diva of the town. Marisa is very organized and keeps a clean work space. She read books daily and kept B engaged all day. We were lucky to have her be a part of the family and highly recommend her services.

description.displayText: Marisa is wonderful with our kids and we can't thank her enough for her help! She has great energy and our 1 year old twins & their big sister have quickly adopted her as family.  If you are looking for a full-time caregiver, don't miss your chance - she's truly excellent!
description.originalText: Marisa is wonderful with our kids and we can't thank her enough for her help! She has great energy and our 1 year old twins & their big sister have quickly adopted her as family.  If you are looking for a full-time caregiver, don't miss your chance - she's truly excellent!

description.displayText:
Hey parents!!

Our absolutely incredible nanny is looking for a new gig and If you are lucky, you'll snatch her up ASAP.

She took care of our twin girls for two years and is really more than an employee- Marisa is family to us at this point.

Marisa is the twin whisperer. Our girls love her to pieces and vice versa. They are so calm with her. She reads to them, sings to them, takes them all around our neighborhood, all the playgrounds and libraries. Never on her phone, never not paying attention. She is always fully devoted to them. She's taught them so much. 

Marisa also does their laundry and light cleanups around the house which has been invaluable to my life and sanity.

She has a car and is generally very prompt. Also she rarely calls out- she knows the working parent's plight.

We miss her every day and the girls light up whenever she comes to babysit for us on a weekend. 

Simply put, Maris

description.displayText: I interviewed with Marisa and had an excellent impression. She's obviously a very professional person with a great work ethic.
description.originalText: I interviewed with Marisa and had an excellent impression. She's obviously a very professional person with a great work ethic.

description.displayText: Marisa worked with my family for 2 years and was an exceptional nanny and part of the family. She is very dedicated and passionate about her job. She was always reliable even when we needed her on short notice on weekends. My son was always well groomed and taken care of At times I would joke with her and say "he was her own' to which she would always reply "he is as long as he is in my care". Being a mother you are always skeptical about leaving your baby in someone's care but with Marisa our doubts and fears were put to rest. If I had a choice to take her to Maryland with my family I would. I can only hope to find someone for the new baby that's as wonderful as her. She still checks in on  us and the kids although she is no longer with us. We truly appreciate her! Thank you. Marisa :). We truly miss you!

description.displayText: Marisa has been great with our 5 month old son. She is very attentive and is always engaging him by talking, singing and playing. She also does a great job of cutting his nails (which we find a daunting task for those little fingers!), and chips in with laundry and cleaning while he is napping. Overall we like her very much and would recommend her to someone looking for a sitter or nanny care.

description.displayText: We were very disappointed about Marisa. We hired her and twenty minutes before starting the job, she texted us and said she twisted her ankle. When we tried to call her never replied back, but texted she was not going to be available for the coming three weeks. It sounded very much like an excuse and we felt very bad about it. She was not reliable.

She was not reliable.

description.displayText: Marisa was a pleasure to have with my kids they are ages 1 & 2. They took a liking to her and had a good time while she was baby sitting them. We use her twice a week for date night.
